title: Party Girl
summaries: The Party Girl is an NPC vendor who sells festive novelty items and furniture.

Unlike other town NPCs, the Party Girl only has a 1/40 (2.5%) chance to be eligible for spawning every 2-minute interval, during which she is subject to regular NPC spawn rate, once the criteria below are met. In other words, she will take on average 40 times longer to spawn than regular NPCs. Along with this percentage chance, she will move in once the following criteria are met:

• There is an available vacant house.
  • (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 14 / [img:Nintendo 3DS version] 12 / (Old-gen console version) 8 other town NPCs are in the world. Note that while the Old Man, Traveling Merchant, and town pets(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) count towards this total, the Skeleton Merchant(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) does not.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, if the Party Girl is killed, she will respawn with normal spawn chances instead of being rarer. On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, she will still follow the lower chance when respawning.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Party Girl will defend herself against nearby enemies by throwing Happy Grenades at them, dealing 30 / 45 / 52 damage at the start of the game, and as players progress she will gain various stat increases. The Party Girl also has a 1/4 (25%) chance of dropping 30–60 Happy Grenades upon death.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, when talked to during a natural <linked>Party</linked>, she will give the first player to talk to her a <linked>Slice of Cake</linked>.

statistics.Damage: 304552 (Confetti Grenade)
